boardgame.name: Design Town
Flip City
デザインタウン
第三小鎮
boardgame.description: Build your own town in Flip City! In this micro-deckbuilding game, you have no hand at all; instead, you play cards directly from the top of your deck. Each card is double-sided, with each side granting different special bonuses. Winning the game requires delicate strategies... and some luck as well!!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On a player's turn, they play cards directly from the top of their deck to acquire cash and victory points. They may continue playing cards as long as they have fewer than three _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;unhappiness_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; icons in play; if they do get three such icons, their turn ends immediately. If they stop before they get three _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;unhappiness_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; icons, they can use their cash to either buy a new card or flip over a card they already own, transforming it into a new, upgraded card. Upgraded cards typically grant more cash and VP as well as the option to flip them back to their non-upgraded side in exchange for an extra bonus._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If a player gains eight or more VP in a single turn, the player wins immediately!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Played just once, cards still in near mint condition. Contains the triple language rules, English included. I am selling off more than half of my collection over the next few weeks. If you are interested in something ask. I might just sell it. Will ship to UK only. Shipping via Myhermes direct to your door including tracking, £5. Payment via paypal. Will combine shipping with other items for lower cost where possible.

Played only once. Cards are bagged within box.

The game contents are brand new and the card decks are still factory sealed. The game comes with a custom drawstring bag rather than box (hence me saying the condition is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;like new_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;). I replaced the box with a drawstring bag (see photo or: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/777421/Flip_both.jpg) because i wanted the box for a project and the box was the perfect size (an expensive box! But I didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want to make one). As you can see from the photo, the bag looks like the front and back of the game box. Postage to UK: £2.50 Postage to rest of Europe: Contact me first with your address.

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT3009) A deceptively simple micro deck builder! The citizens of Flip City want you to expand and renovate their neighborhoods -- but if you ask for too much in taxes all at once, they won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be happy! To keep them at ease, you will play cards from the top of your deck (no hand!), push your luck, build your deck, and upgrade cards by flipping them.
